title: Power 5 Non-Conference Scheduling
text:
Code
library(tidyverse)
p5 <- read_csv("POWER 5 NON-CON QUAD BREAKDOWN.csv")

bama <- p5 |> filter(TEAM == "Alabama")
minn <- p5 |> filter(TEAM == "Minnesota")
gtown <- p5 |> filter(TEAM == "Georgetown")
unc <- p5 |> filter(TEAM == "North Carolina")
purdue <- p5 |> filter(TEAM == "Purdue")
nw <- p5 |> filter(TEAM == "Northwestern")
prov <- p5 |> filter(TEAM == "Providence")

ggplot() + 
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-15, 15)) +
  geom_line(data=p5, aes(x=SEASON, y=NCSOS, group=TEAM), color="lightgrey") +
  geom_line(data=bama, aes(x=SEASON, y=NCSOS, group=TEAM), color="#9E1B32") +
  geom_line(data=minn, aes(x=SEASON, y=NCSOS, group=TEAM), color="#FFC627") +
  geom_line(data=gtown, aes(x=SEASON, y=NCSOS, group=TEAM), color="#041E42") +
  geom_line(data=unc, aes(x=SEASON, y=NCSOS, group=TEAM), color="#007FAE") +
  geom_line(data=purdue, aes(x=SEASON, y=NCSOS, group=TEAM), color="#CFB991") +
  geom_line(data=nw, aes(x=SEASON, y=NCSOS, group=TEAM), color="#4E2A84") +
  geom_line(data=prov, aes(x=SEASON, y=NCSOS, group=TEAM), color="#8a8d8f") +
  annotate("text", x=2022.5, y=11.5, label="Alabama", colour="black") +
  annotate("text", x=2024, y=-14, label="Minnesota", colour="black") +
  annotate("text", x=2024.75, y=-12.5, label="Georgetown", colour="black") +
  annotate("text", x=2024.75, y=14.25, label="North Carolina", colour="black") +
  annotate("text", x=2024, y=11.5, label="Purdue", colour="black") +
  annotate("text", x=2022.25, y=-11.5, label="Northwestern", colour="black") +
  annotate("text", x=2023, y=-10, label="Providence", colour="black") +
  labs(title = "Power 5 Teams Schedule Similarily from Year to Year",
       subtitle = "Focusing on the Easiest and Hardest Schedule Each Year",
       caption = "Source: KenPom | By Simon Kerr") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 19, face ="bold"),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 8),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 10),
    plot.title.position = "plot"
  )

tourney <- p5 |> filter(`NCWIN%` >= .545)

model = lm(`NCWIN%` ~ `NCSOS`, data=p5)
summary(model)
